TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit CutCopyPasteHelper extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides functions to cut, copy, and paste items.

Docs.param: The editing context to be verified.
Docs.summary: Verifies whether items can be copied from the specified editing context.
Docs.returns: if the number of the selected objects is more than 0 and is not ; otherwise, .

Docs.param: The editing context to be verified.
Docs.summary: Verifies whether items can be cut from the specified editing context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool CanPaste(class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The editing context for the paste operation.
Docs.summary: Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the specified objects can be pasted.
Docs.returns: if the number of the specified objects is more than 0 and not ; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DoCopy(class System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The editing context from which items are copied.

Docs.summary: Pastes items in the clipboard in a default location in the specified editing context.
